Athlete - Class in components
The Athlete class stores relevant information about athletes who finish the races, enabling quick results summarization with names, grades, previous PRs, and other relevant imformation
Athlete() - Constructor for class components.Athlete
No-args constructor for an Athlete Constructs a new Athlete with blank information
Athlete(String) - Constructor for class components.Athlete
Constructs a new Athlete with fields other than name left blank
Athlete(String, String) - Constructor for class components.Athlete
Constructs a new Athlete with fields other than name and school left blank
Athlete(String, String, int) - Constructor for class components.Athlete
Constructs a new Athlete with seed time and PR left blank
Athlete(String, String, int, TimeFormat) - Constructor for class components.Athlete
Constructs a new Athlete with PR left blank
Athlete(String, String, int, TimeFormat, TimeFormat) - Constructor for class components.Athlete
Constructs a new Athlete with all fields filled out

execute() - Method in class components.ThreadedCameraRunner
ThreadedCameraRunner.execute() should be called exactly once to start the camera with sound-based starting using CameraStarter and run the camera according to control messages from receiveMessage()

T

ThreadedCameraRunner - Class in components
ThreadedCameraRunner handles the real-time control and capturing of camera data used for creating the finish image and optionally runs OCR by offloading to OCRCapture.
ThreadedCameraRunner() - Constructor for class components.ThreadedCameraRunner
Constructs a new ThreadedCameraRunner with the default sound threshold for starting (see CameraStarter documentation for details on the sound thresholding)
ThreadedCameraRunner(int) - Constructor for class components.ThreadedCameraRunner
Constructs a new ThreadedCameraRunner with a specified sound threshold for sound-based starting (see CameraStarter documentation for details on the sound thresholding)
TimeFormat - Class in components
Holds Time data in a way that is intuitively displayed and compatible with system times.
TimeFormat() - Constructor for class components.TimeFormat
Constructs a zero-valued TimeFormat
TimeFormat(int) - Constructor for class components.TimeFormat
Constructs a TimeFormat when the time in question is system time
TimeFormat(int, int) - Constructor for class components.TimeFormat
Constructs a TimeFormat when the time in question is in the order of hours
TimeFormat(int, int, int) - Constructor for class components.TimeFormat
Constructs a TimeFormat when the time in question is in the order of minutes
TimeFormat(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class components.TimeFormat
Constructs a TimeFormat when the time in question is in the order of hours
TimeFormat(String) - Constructor for class components.TimeFormat
Constructs a TimeFormat from an already-formatted String
